00016 class QwtPlotItem::PrivateData
00017 {
00018 public:
00019     PrivateData():
00020         plot(NULL),
00021         isVisible(true),
00022         attributes(0),
00023 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00024         renderHints(0),
00025 #endif
00026         z(0.0),
00027         xAxis(QwtPlot::xBottom),
00028         yAxis(QwtPlot::yLeft)
00029     {
00030     }
00031 
00032     mutable QwtPlot *plot;
00033 
00034     bool isVisible;
00035     int attributes;
00036 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00037     int renderHints;
00038 #endif
00039     double z;
00040 
00041     int xAxis;
00042     int yAxis;
00043 
00044     QwtText title;
00045 };

00048 QwtPlotItem::QwtPlotItem(const QwtText &title)
00049 {
00050     d_data = new PrivateData;
00051     d_data->title = title;
00052 }
00053 
00055 QwtPlotItem::~QwtPlotItem()
00056 {
00057     attach(NULL);
00058     delete d_data;
00059 }
00060 
00064 void QwtPlotItem::attach(QwtPlot *plot)
00065 {
00066     if ( plot == d_data->plot )
00067         return;
00068 
00069     // remove the item from the previous plot
00070 
00071     if ( d_data->plot )
00072     {
00073         if ( d_data->plot->legend() )
00074         {
00075             QWidget *legendItem = d_data->plot->legend()->find(this);
00076             if ( legendItem )
00077                 delete legendItem; 
00078         }
00079 
00080         d_data->plot->attachItem(this, false);
00081 
00082         if ( d_data->plot->autoReplot() )
00083             d_data->plot->update();
00084     }
00085 
00086     d_data->plot = plot;
00087 
00088     if ( d_data->plot )
00089     {
00090         // insert the item into the current plot
00091 
00092         d_data->plot->attachItem(this, true);
00093         itemChanged();
00094     }
00095 }

00097 int QwtPlotItem::rtti() const
00098 {
00099     return Rtti_PlotItem;

00103 QwtPlot *QwtPlotItem::plot() const 
00104 { 
00105     return d_data->plot;

00107 
00108 double QwtPlotItem::z() const 
00109 { 
00110     return d_data->z; 
00111 }
00112 
00113 void QwtPlotItem::setZ(double z) 
00114 { 
00115     if ( d_data->z != z )
00116     {
00117         d_data->z = z; 
00118         if ( d_data->plot )
00119         {
00120             // update the z order
00121             d_data->plot->attachItem(this, false);
00122             d_data->plot->attachItem(this, true);
00123         }
00124         itemChanged();
00125     }
00126 }

00135 {
00136     setTitle(QwtText(title));

00145 void QwtPlotItem::setTitle(const QwtText &title)
00146 {
00147     if ( d_data->title != title )
00148     {
00149         d_data->title = title; 
00150         itemChanged();
00151     }
00152 }

00158 const QwtText &QwtPlotItem::title() const
00159 {
00160     return d_data->title;

00162 
00163 void QwtPlotItem::setItemAttribute(ItemAttribute attribute, bool on)
00164 {
00165     if ( bool(d_data->attributes & attribute) != on )
00166     {
00167         if ( on )
00168             d_data->attributes |= attribute;
00169         else
00170             d_data->attributes &= ~attribute;
00171 
00172         itemChanged();
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00176 bool QwtPlotItem::testItemAttribute(ItemAttribute attribute) const
00177 {
00178     return d_data->attributes & attribute;
00179 }

00182 
00183 void QwtPlotItem::setRenderHint(RenderHint hint, bool on)
00184 {
00185     if ( (d_data->renderHints & hint) != on )
00186     {
00187         if ( on )
00188             d_data->renderHints |= hint;
00189         else
00190             d_data->renderHints &= ~hint;
00191 
00192         itemChanged();
00193     }
00194 }
00195 
00196 bool QwtPlotItem::testRenderHint(RenderHint hint) const
00197 {
00198     return (d_data->renderHints & hint);
00199 }
00200 
00201 #endif

00216 void QwtPlotItem::setVisible(bool on) 
00217 { 
00218     if ( on != d_data->isVisible )
00219     {
00220         d_data->isVisible = on; 
00221         itemChanged(); 
00222     }
00223 }

00229 bool QwtPlotItem::isVisible() const
00230 { 
00231     return d_data->isVisible; 
00232 }
00233 
00235 void QwtPlotItem::itemChanged()
00236 {
00237     if ( d_data->plot )
00238     {
00239         if ( d_data->plot->legend() )
00240             updateLegend(d_data->plot->legend());
00241 
00242         d_data->plot->autoRefresh();
00243     }
00244 }
00245 
00247 void QwtPlotItem::setAxis(int xAxis, int yAxis)
00248 {
00249     if (xAxis == QwtPlot::xBottom || xAxis == QwtPlot::xTop )
00250        d_data->xAxis = xAxis;
00251 
00252     if (yAxis == QwtPlot::yLeft || yAxis == QwtPlot::yRight )
00253        d_data->yAxis = yAxis;
00254 
00255     itemChanged();    
00256 }
00257 
00259 void QwtPlotItem::setXAxis(int axis)
00260 {
00261     if (axis == QwtPlot::xBottom || axis == QwtPlot::xTop )
00262     {
00263        d_data->xAxis = axis;
00264        itemChanged();    
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00269 void QwtPlotItem::setYAxis(int axis)
00270 {
00271     if (axis == QwtPlot::yLeft || axis == QwtPlot::yRight )
00272     {
00273        d_data->yAxis = axis;
00274        itemChanged();   
00275     }
00276 }

00290 QwtDoubleRect QwtPlotItem::boundingRect() const
00291 {
00292     return QwtDoubleRect(1.0, 1.0, -2.0, -2.0); // invalid

00295 QWidget *QwtPlotItem::legendItem() const
00296 {
00297     return new QwtLegendItem;
00298 }
00299 
00300 void QwtPlotItem::updateLegend(QwtLegend *legend) const
00301 {
00302     if ( !legend )
00303         return;
00304 
00305     QWidget *lgdItem = legend->find(this);
00306     if ( testItemAttribute(QwtPlotItem::Legend) )
00307     {
00308         if ( lgdItem == NULL )
00309         {
00310             lgdItem = legendItem();
00311             if ( lgdItem )
00312             {
00313                 if ( lgdItem->inherits("QwtLegendItem") )
00314                 {
00315                     QwtLegendItem *label = (QwtLegendItem *)lgdItem;
00316                     label->setItemMode(legend->itemMode());
00317 
00318                     if ( d_data->plot )
00319                     {
00320                         QObject::connect(label, SIGNAL(clicked()), 
00321                             d_data->plot, SLOT(legendItemClicked()));
00322                         QObject::connect(label, SIGNAL(checked(bool)), 
00323                             d_data->plot, SLOT(legendItemChecked(bool)));
00324                     }
00325                 }
00326                 legend->insert(this, lgdItem);
00327             }
00328         }
00329         if ( lgdItem && lgdItem->inherits("QwtLegendItem") )
00330         {
00331             QwtLegendItem* label = (QwtLegendItem*)lgdItem;
00332             if ( label )
00333                 label->setText(d_data->title);
00334         }
00335     }
00336     else
00337     {
00338         delete lgdItem;
00339     }
00340 }

00347 QwtDoubleRect QwtPlotItem::scaleRect(const QwtScaleMap &xMap, 
00348     const QwtScaleMap &yMap) const
00349 {
00350     return QwtDoubleRect(xMap.s1(), yMap.s1(), 
00351         xMap.sDist(), yMap.sDist() );
00352 }
00353 
00354 QRect QwtPlotItem::paintRect(const QwtScaleMap &xMap, 
00355     const QwtScaleMap &yMap) const
00356 {
00357     const QRect rect( qRound(xMap.p1()), qRound(yMap.p1()),
00358         qRound(xMap.pDist()), qRound(yMap.pDist()) );
00359 
00360     return rect;
00361 }
00362 
00363 QRect QwtPlotItem::transform(const QwtScaleMap &xMap, 
00364     const QwtScaleMap &yMap, const QwtDoubleRect& rect) const
00365 {
00366     int x1 = qRound(xMap.transform(rect.left()));
00367     int x2 = qRound(xMap.transform(rect.right()));
00368     int y1 = qRound(yMap.transform(rect.top()));
00369     int y2 = qRound(yMap.transform(rect.bottom()));
00370 
00371     if ( x2 < x1 )
00372         qSwap(x1, x2);
00373     if ( y2 < y1 )
00374         qSwap(y1, y2);
00375 
00376     return QRect(x1, y1, x2 - x1 - 1, y2 - y1 - 1);
00377 }
00378 
00379 QwtDoubleRect QwtPlotItem::invTransform(const QwtScaleMap &xMap, 
00380     const QwtScaleMap &yMap, const QRect& rect) const
00381 {
00382     const double x1 = xMap.invTransform(rect.x());
00383     const double x2 = xMap.invTransform(rect.x() + rect.width() + 1);
00384     const double y1 = yMap.invTransform(rect.y());
00385     const double y2 = yMap.invTransform(rect.y() + rect.height() + 1);
00386 
00387     const QwtDoubleRect r(x1, y1, x2 - x1, y2 - y1);
00388 
00389     return r.normalized();
00390 }
